- Row 29: opponent=romford raiders, venue=home, result=won 7 - 2, attendance=1238, competition=league, man of the match=martin bouz (not stuart potts)
- Row 30: opponent=bracknell bees, venue=away, result=won 4 - 0, attendance=not reported, competition=league/cup, man of the match=joe watkins (not stuart potts)

Since we found no row where both conditions are met (competition: league/cup and man of the match: stuart potts), it means that "stuart potts wasn't the man of the match in the league / cup."
